GV05brupsb2u:842: yo ha vai śiśuṃ sādhānaṃ sapratyādhānaṃ sasthūṇaṃ sadāmaṃ veda, tasyedaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:843: phalam; kiṃ tat? sapta saptasaṃkhyākān ha dviṣato dveṣakartṝn bhrātṛvyān /
GV05brupsb2u:844: bhrātṛvyā hi dvividhā bhavanti, dviṣanto 'dviṣantaśca, tatra dviṣanto ye
GV05brupsb2u:845: bhrātṛvyāstān dviṣato bhrātṛvyānavaruṇaddhi; sapta ye śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā viṣayopalabdhidvārāṇi tatprabhavā viṣayarāgāḥ sahajatvād bhrātṛvyāḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:846: te hyasya svātmasthāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ viṣayaviṣayāṃ kurvanti, tena te dveṣṭāro
GV05brupsb2u:850: tatra yaḥ śiśvādīnveda, teṣāṃ yāthātmyamavadhārayati, sa etān bhrātṛvyānavaruṇaddhyapāvṛṇoti vināśayati /
GV05brupsb2u:852: ko 'sau? yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ, śarīramadhye yaḥ prāṇo liṅgātmā, yaḥ pañcadhā śarīramāviṣṭaḥ-bṛhanpāṇḍaravāsaḥ soma rājannityuktaḥ,
GV05brupsb2u:853: yasminvāṅmanaḥ prabhṛtīni karaṇāni viṣaktāni-paḍvīśaśaṅkunidarśanāt; sa eṣa śiśuriva, viṣayeṣvitarakaraṇavadapaṭutvāt; śiśuṃ sādhānamityuktam /
GV05brupsb2u:854: kiṃ punastasya śiśorvatsasthānīyasya karaṇātmana ādhānam? tasyedameva śarīramādhānaṃ kāryātmakam-ādhīyate 'sminnityādhānam; tasya hi śiśoḥ
GV05brupsb2u:855: prāṇasyedaṃ śarīramadhiṣṭhānam, asminhi karaṇānyadhiṣṭhitāni labdhātmakānyupalabdhidvārāṇi bhavanti, na tu prāṇamātre viṣaktāni /
GV05brupsb2u:856: tathā hi darśitamajātaśatruṇā-upasaṃhṛteṣu karaṇeṣu vijñānamayo nopalabhyate, śarīradeśavyūḍheṣu tu karaṇeṣu vijñānamaya upalabhamāna upalabhyate-tacca darśitaṃ pāṇipeṣapratibodhanena idaṃ pratyādhānaṃ śiraḥ; pradeśaviśeṣeṣu-prati pratyādhīyata iti pratyādhānam /
GV05brupsb2u:858: balāvaṣṭambho hi prāṇo 'smiñcharīre-"sa yatrāyamātmābalyaṃ nyetya saṃmohamiva"iti darśanāt
GV05brupsb2u:859: yathā vatsaḥ sthūṇāvaṣṭambha evaṃ śarīrapakṣapātī vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ sthūṇeti kecit /
GV05brupsb2u:860: annaṃ dāma-annaṃ hi bhuktaṃ tredhā pariṇamate;ya;sthūlaḥ pariṇāmaḥ, sa etaddvayaṃ bhūtvā imāmapyeti-mūtraṃ ca purīṣaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb2u:861: yo madhyamo rasaḥ sa raso lohitādikrameṇa svakāryaṃ śarīraṃ sāptadhātukamupacinoti;svayonyannāgame hi śarīramupacīyate 'nnamayatvāt;viparyaye 'pakṣīyate patati;yastvaṇiṣṭho rasaḥ-amṛtam
GV05brupsb2u:862: ūrkprabhāvaḥ-iti ca kathyate, sa nābherūrdhvaṃ hṛdayadeśamāgatya,
GV05brupsb2u:863: hṛdayādviprasṛteṣu dvāsaptatināḍīsahasreṣvanupraviśya yattatkaraṇasaṅghātarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ śiśusañjñakam, tasya śarīre sthitikāraṇaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:866: idānīṃ tasyaiva śiśoḥ pratyādhāna ūḍhasya cakṣuṣi kāścanopaniṣada ucyante-
GV05brupsb2u:868: tad yā imā akṣaṃl lohinyo rājayas tābhir enaṃ rudro 'nvāyattaḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:869: atha yā akṣann āpas tābhiḥ parjanyaḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:875: nāsyānnaṃ kṣīyate ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_2,2.2 ||
GV05brupsb2u:876: tametāḥ saptākṣitaya upatiṣṭhantetaṃ karaṇātmakaṃ prāmaṃ śarīre
GV05brupsb2u:878: yadyapi mantrakaraṇe tiṣṭhatirupapūrva ātmanepadī bhavati, ihāpi sapta devatābhidhānāni mantrasthānīyāni karaṇāni;tiṣṭhaterato 'trāpyātmanepadaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:880: kāstā akṣitayaḥ? ityucyante-tattatra yā imāḥ prasiddhāḥ, akṣannakṣaṇi lohinyo lohitā rājayo rekhāḥ, tābhirdvārabhūtābhirenaṃ madhyamaṃ prāṇaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:884: sa cānnabhūto 'kṣitiḥ prāṇasya;"parjanye varṣatyānandinaḥ prāṇā bhavanti"iti śrutyantarāt
GV05brupsb2u:885: yā kanīnakā dṛkchaktistayā kanīnakayā dvāreṇādityo madhyamaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:889: etāḥ saptānnabhūtāḥ prāṇasya santatamupatiṣṭhante-ityevaṃ yo veda,
GV05brupsb2u:893: arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnas tasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam |
GV05brupsb2u:894: tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīre vāg aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti |
GV05brupsb2u:896: idaṃ tac charīra eṣa hy arvāgbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:904: vāg ghy aṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvitte || BrhUp_2,2.3 ||
GV05brupsb2u:905: tattatraitasminnarthe eṣa śloko mantro bhavati-arvāgbilaścamasa ityādiḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:908: kaḥ punarasāvarvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ? idaṃ tat śiraḥ, camasākāraṃ hi tat /
GV05brupsb2u:909: katham? eṣa hyarvāgbilo mukhasya bilarūpatvāt, śiraso budhnākāratvādūrdhvabudhnaḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:910: tasminyaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpamiti-yathā somaścamase, evaṃ tasmiñchirasi viśvarūpaṃ nānārūpaṃ nihitaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb2u:911: kiṃ punastad yaśaḥ? prāṇā vai yaśo viśvarūpam-prāṇāḥ śrotrādayo vāyavaśca marutaḥ saptadhā teṣu prasṛtā yaśaḥ-ityetadāha mantraḥ,
GV05brupsb2u:913: tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīra iti-prāṇāḥ parispandātmakāḥ, ta eva ca ṛṣayaḥ,
GV05brupsb2u:915: vāgaṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti-brahmaṇā saṃvādaṃ kurvatī aṣṭamī
GV05brupsb2u:918: ke punastasya camasasya tīra āsata ṛṣaya iti /
GV05brupsb2u:927: attir ha vai nāmaitad yad autrir iti |
GV05brupsb2u:929: sarvam asyānnaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_2,2.4 ||
GV05brupsb2u:932: tathā cakṣuṣī upadiśannuvāca-imāveva viśvāmitrajamadagnī dakṣiṇaṃ viśvāmitra uttaraṃ jamadagnirviparyayeṇa vā /
GV05brupsb2u:933: imāveva vasiṣṭhakaśyapau-nāsike upadiśannuvāca;dakṣiṇaḥ puṭo bhavati vasiṣṭhaḥ, uttaraḥ kaśyapaḥ pūrvavat /
GV05brupsb2u:938: attaiva bhavati nāmuṣminnannena punaḥ pratipadyata ityetaduktaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:940: ya evametadyathoktaṃ prāṇayāthātmyaṃ veda, sa evaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇo bhūtvā
GV05brupsb2u:941: ādhānapratyādhānagato bhoktaiva bhavati, na bhojyam, bhojyād vyāvartata ityarthaḥ //4//
GV05brupsb2u:945: yāḥ prāṇānāmupaniṣadaḥ, tā brahmopaniṣatprasaṅgena vyākhyātāḥ-ete te prāṇā iti cacha te
GV05brupsb2u:946: kimātmakāḥ? kathaṃ vā teṣāṃ satyatvam? iti ca vaktavyamiti pañcabhūtānāṃ satyānāṃ kāryakaraṇātmakānāṃ
GV05brupsb2u:953: tatra dvirūpaṃ brahma pañcabhūtajanitakāryakaraṇasambaddhaṃ mūrtāmūrtākhyaṃ martyāmṛtasvabhāvaṃ tajjanitavāsanārūpaṃ ca sarvañjñaṃ sarvaśakti sopākhyaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb2u:958: tatra yadapohadvāreṇa 'neti neti'iti nirdiśyate brahma, te ete dve
GV05brupsb2u:961: ke te dve? mūrtaṃ caiva mūrtameva ca /
GV05brupsb2u:964: kāni punastāni viśeṣaṇāni mūrtāmūrtayoḥ? ityucyante-martyaṃ ca martyaṃ maraṇadharmi, amṛtaṃ ca tadviparītam, sthitaṃ ca-paricchinnaṃ gatipūrvakaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:969: tatra catuṣṭayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ mūrtaṃ tathā amūrtaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb2u:970: tatra kāni mūrtaviśeṣaṇāni? kāni cetarāṇi? iti vibhajyate /
GV05brupsb2u:971: tad etan mūrtaṃ yad anyad vāyoś cāntarikṣāc ca |
GV05brupsb2u:975: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso ya eṣa tapati |
GV05brupsb2u:981: yasmātsthitametat;paricchinnaṃ hyarthāntareṇa samprayujyamānaṃ virudhyate-yathā ghaṭaḥ stambhakuṇḍyādinā;tathā mūrtaṃ sthitaṃ paricchinnam arthāntarasambandhi tator'thāntaravirodhānmartyam;etatsadviśeṣya māṇāsādhāraṇadharmavat,
GV05brupsb2u:986: sarvathāpi tu bhūtatrayaṃ catuṣṭayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaṃ mūrtaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ
GV05brupsb2u:988: viśeṣaṇamityāha-tasyaitasya mūrtasya, etasya martyasya, etasya sthitasya,
GV05brupsb2u:989: etasya sataḥ-catuṣṭayaviśeṣaṇasya bhūtatrayasyetyarthaḥ, eṣa rasaḥ sāra
GV05brupsb2u:991: trayāṇāṃ hi bhūtānāṃ sāriṣṭhaḥ savitā;etatsārāṇi trīṇi bhūtāni, yata etatkṛtavibhajyamānarūpaviśeṣaṇāni
GV05brupsb2u:992: kāryasyaitadrūpam-yatsavitā yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati;sato bhūtatrayasya hi yasmādeṣa rasa ityetad gṛhyate /
GV05brupsb2u:1001: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa etasmin maṇḍale puruṣaḥ
GV05brupsb2u:1010: tasyaitasyāmūrtasya tasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasya catuṣṭayaviśeṣaṇasyāmūrtasyaiṣa rasaḥ;ko 'sau? ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ-karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaḥ prāṇa ityabhidhīyate
GV05brupsb2u:1011: yaḥ, sa eṣo 'mūrtasya bhūtadvayasya rasaḥ pūrvavatsāriṣṭhaḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:1014: tyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ-yasmādyo maṇḍalasthaḥ puruṣo maṇḍalavanna gṛhyate sāraśca bhūtadvayasya, tasmādasti maṇḍalasthasya puruṣasya bhūtadvayasya ca sādharmyam, tasmādyuktaṃ prasiddhavadvetūpādānam-tyasya hyeṣa rasa iti
GV05brupsb2u:1015: rasaḥ kāraṇaṃ hiraṇyagarbhavijñānātmā cetana iti kecit /
GV05brupsb2u:1016: tatra ca kila hiraṇyagarbhavijñānātmanaḥ karma vāyvantarikṣayoḥ prayoktṛ,
GV05brupsb2u:1017: tatkarma vāyvantarikṣādhāraṃ sadanyeṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prayoktṛ bhavati;tena
GV05brupsb2u:1018: svakarmaṇā vāyvantarikṣayoḥ prayokteti tayo rasaḥ kāraṇamucyata iti /
GV05brupsb2u:1020: mūrtasya tu bhūtatrayasya raso mūrtameva maṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhūtatrayasya raso mūrtameva maṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhūtatrayasamānajātīyam, na
GV05brupsb2u:1021: cetanaḥ;tathāmūrtayorapi bhūtayostatsamānajātīyenaivāmūrtasena yuktaṃ bhavitum;vākyapravṛttestulyatvāt;yathā hi mūrtāmūrte catuṣṭayadharmavatī
GV05brupsb2u:1022: vibhajyete, tathā rasarasavatorapi mūrtāmūrtayostulyenaiva nyāyena yukto vibhāgaḥ, na tvardhavaiśasam
GV05brupsb2u:1023: mūrtarase 'pi maṇḍalopādhiścetano vivakṣyata iti cet? atyalpamidamucyate,
GV05brupsb2u:1025: puruṣaśabdo 'cetane 'nupapanna iti cet! na, pakṣapucchādiviśiṣṭasyaiva liṅgasya puruṣaśabdadarśanāt
GV05brupsb2u:1026: "na vā itthaṃ santaḥ śakṣyāmaḥ prajāḥ prajanayitumimānsapta puruṣānekaṃ puruṣaṃ karavāmeti ta etānsapta puruṣānekaṃ puruṣamakurvan"ityādau
GV05brupsb2u:1031: idam eva mūrtaṃ yad anyat prāṇāc ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:1035: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yac cakṣuḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:1037: athādhunādhyātmaṃ mūrtāmūrtayorvibhāga ucyate-kiṃ tanmūrtam? idameva, kiṃ
GV05brupsb2u:1038: cedam? yadanyatprāṇāccavāyoryaścāyamantarabhyantare ātmannātmanyākāśaḥ khaṃ śarīrasthaśca yaḥ prāṇa etad dvayaṃ varjayitvā yadanyaccharīrārambhakaṃ bhūtatrayam, etanmartyamityādi samānamanyatpūrveṇa etasya sato hyeṣa rasaḥ-yaccakṣuriti; ādhyātmikasya śarīrārambhakasya kāryasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāraḥ; tena hi sāreṇa sāravadidaṃ śarīraṃ samastaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:1040: prāthamyācca-cakṣuṣī eva prathame sambhavataḥ sambhavata iti /
GV05brupsb2u:1041: "tejo raso niranartatāgniḥ"iti liṅgāt; taijasaṃ hi cakṣuḥ; etatsāram;
GV05brupsb2u:1042: taijasaṃ hi cakṣuḥ; etatsāram ādhyātmikaṃ bhūtatrayam; sato hyeṣa rasa iti mūrtatvasāratve hetvarthaḥ //4//
GV05brupsb2u:1044: athāmūrtaṃ prāṇaś ca yaś cāyam antar ātmann ākāśaḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:1048: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyaitasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ
GV05brupsb2u:1054: etasya tyasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāraḥ, yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ-dakṣiṇe
GV05brupsb2u:1056: viśeṣato 'dhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ śāsatrasya pratyakṣaṃ sarvaśrutiṣu tathā prayogadarśanāt /
GV05brupsb2u:1057: tyasya hyeṣa rasa iti pūrvavadviśeṣato 'grahaṇādamūrtatvasāratve eva hetvarthaḥ //5//
GV05brupsb2u:1059: brahmaṇaṇa upādhibhūtayormūrtāmūrtayoḥ kāryakaraṇavibhāgena adhyātmādhidaivatayorvibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ satyaśabdavācyayoḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:1062: yathā māhārajanaṃ vāso yathā pāṇḍvāvikaṃ yathendragopo yathāgnyarcir yathā puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā sakṛdvidyuttam |
GV05brupsb2u:1063: sakṛdvidyutteva ha vā asya śrīr bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brupsb2u:1065: na hy etasmād iti nety anyat param asti |
GV05brupsb2u:1069: tasya haitasya puruṣasya karaṇātmano liṅgasya rūpaṃ vakṣyāmo vāsanāmayaṃ mūrtāmūrtavāsanāvijñānamayasaṃyogajanitaṃ vicitraṃ paṭabhitticitravanmāyendrajālamṛgatṛṣṇikopamaṃ sarvavyāmohāspadametāvanmātrameva ātmeti vijñānavādino vaināśikā yatra
GV05brupsb2u:1070: bhrāntāḥ, etadeva vāsanārūpaṃ paṭarūpavadātmano dravyasya guṇa iti
GV05brupsb2u:1071: naiyāyikā vaiśeṣikāśca sampratipannāḥ, idamātmārthaṃ triguṇaṃ svatantraṃ
GV05brupsb2u:1072: pradhānāśrayaṃ puruṣārthena hetunā pravartata iti sāṅkhyāḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:1074: paramātmarāśiruttamaḥ, tābhyāmanyo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ kila tṛtīyaḥ kartrā bhoktrāvijñānamayena ajātaśatrupratibodhitena saha
GV05brupsb2u:1075: vidyākarmapūrvaprajñāsamudāyaḥ;prayoktā karmarāśiḥ, prayojyaḥ pūrvokto mūrtāmūrtabhūtarāśiḥ sādhanaṃ ceti /
GV05brupsb2u:1076: tatra ca tārkikaiḥ saha sandhiṃ kurvanti /
GV05brupsb2u:1078: sarvaḥ karmarāśiḥ-puṣpāśraya iva gandhaḥ puṣpaviyoge 'pi puṭatailāśrayo
GV05brupsb2u:1079: bhavati, tadvat-liṅgaviyoge 'pi paramātmaikadeśamāśrayati, sa paramātmaikadeśaḥ kilānyata āgatena guṇena karmaṇā saguṇo bhavati nirguṇo
GV05brupsb2u:1080: 'pi san, sa kartā bhoktā badhyate mucyate ca vijñānātmā - iti
GV05brupsb2u:1081: vaiśeṣikacittamapyanusaranti;sa ca karmarāśirbhūtarāśerāgantukaḥ, svato nirguṇa eva paramātmaikadeśatvāt;svata utthitā avidyā anāgantukāpyūṣaravadanātmadharmaḥ-ityanayā kalpanayā sāṅkhyacittamanuvartante sarvametattārkikaiḥ saha sāmañjasyakalpanayā ramaṇīyaṃ paśyanti,
GV05brupsb2u:1082: lopaniṣatsiddhāntaṃ sarvanyāyavirodhaṃ ca paśyanti;katham? uktā eva tāvatsāva yavatve paramātmanaḥ
GV05brupsb2u:1088: na ca vāsya deśavyatirekeṇa vāsanāyā vastvantarasañcaraṇaṃ manasāpi kalpayituṃ śakyam /
GV05brupsb2u:1089: na ca śrutayo gacchanti"kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā" "hṛdaye hyeva rūpāṇi"
GV05brupsb2u:1090: "dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva" "kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ""tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñchokānhṛdayasya"ityādyāḥ
GV05brupsb2u:1091: na cāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ śrutādarthāntarakalpanā nyāyyā, ātmanaḥ
GV05brupsb2u:1094: tathāpi vedārthaścetsyātkāmaṃ bhavatu, na me dveṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:1095: na ca 'dva vāva brahmaṇo rūpe'iti rāśitrayapakṣe samañjasam;yadā tu mūrtāmūrte tajjanitavāsanāśca mūrtāmūrte dve rūpe, brahma ca rūpi tṛtīyam,
GV05brupsb2u:1096: na cānyaccaturthamantarāletadā etadanukūlamavadhāraṇam, dve eva brahmaṇo
GV05brupsb2u:1097: rūpe iti;anyathā brahmaikadeśasya vijñānātmano rūpe iti kalpyam,
GV05brupsb2u:1099: tadā ca rūpe eveti dvivacanamasamañjasam, rūpāṇīti vāsanābhiḥ saha
GV05brupsb2u:1100: bahuvacanaṃ yuktataraṃ syāt- dve ca mūrtāmūrte vāsanāśca tṛtīyamiti /
GV05brupsb2u:1101: atha mūrtāmūrte eva paramātmano rūpe, vāsanāstu vijñānātmana iti cet-tadā
GV05brupsb2u:1103: syāt, vāsanāyā api vijñānātmadvāratvasya aviśiṣṭatvāt;na ca vastu

GV05brupsb2u:1107: 'yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ'iti liṅgātmā prastuto 'dhyātme, adhidaive ca 'ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale

GV05brupsb2u:1139: vāsaḥ'ityādayaḥ, kiṃ tarhi? prakārapradarśanārthāḥ-evamprakārāṇi hi vāsanārūpāṇīti /

GV05brupsb2u:1147: kaḥ punarasau nirdeśaḥ? ityucyate-neti netītyevaṃ nirdeśaḥ /

GV05brupsb2u:1162: yadanyatprakṛtātpratiṣiddhadvayādbrahma tanna nirdiṣṭam, kīdṛśaṃ nu khalu-ityāśaṅkā na nivartiṣyate;tathā cānarthakaśca sa nirdeśaḥ, puruṣasya vividiṣāyā anivartakatvāt;
GV05brupsb2u:1164: yadā tu sarvadikkālādivividiṣā nivartitā syāt sarvopādhinirākaraṇadvāreṇa tadā saindhavaghanavadekarasaṃ prajñānaghanamanantaramabāhyaṃ satyasya satyamahaṃbrahmāsmīti sarvato nivartate vividiṣā, ātmanyevāvasthitā prajñā bhavati /
GV05brupsb2u:1166: nanu mahatā yatnena parikarabandhaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ yuktamevaṃ nirdeśṭuṃ brahma?

GV05brupsb2u:1172: nāmadheyam;kiṃ tat? satyasya satyaṃ prāṇā vai satyaṃ teṣāmeṣa satyamiti

GV05brupsb2u:1200: 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ"ityataḥ"kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmaḥ"ityeṣa vibhāgastairna śrutaḥ śrutyā kṛtaḥ; sarvakriyākārakaphalopamardasvarūpāyāṃ ca vidyāyāṃ

GV05brupsb2u:1224: maitreyīti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- udyāsyan vā are 'ham asmāt sthānād asmi

GV05brupsb2u:1242: yājñavalkyaḥ-kathamiti yadyākṣepārtham, anumodanaṃ neti hovāca yājñavalkya

GV05brupsb2u:1250: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ -- priyā batāre naḥ satī priyaṃ bhāṣase |

GV05brupsb2u:1258: vyācakṣāṇasya tu me mama vyākhyānaṃ kurvato nididhyāsasva vākyānyarthato niścayena dhyātumiccheti
GV05brupsb2u:1260: sa hovāca -- na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavaty ātmanas tu kāmāya patiḥ priyo bhavati |

GV05brupsb2u:1262: na vā are putrāṇāṃ kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanty ātmanas tu kāmāya putrāḥ priyā bhavanti |

GV05brupsb2u:1304: 'nyatrātmana ātmasvarūpavyatirekeṇa-ātmaiva na bhavatīyaṃ brāhmaṇajātiriti-tāṃ yo veda, taṃ parādadhyātsā
